subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer, playing his first match since the United States Open, hit another between-the-legs shot in his 6-3, 6-4 victory over John Isner at the Shanghai Masters.
snippet: Roger Federer, playing his first match since the United States Open, hit another between-the-legs shot in his 6-3, 6-4 victory over John Isner at the Shanghai Masters.
